attributes.action: Hold Jeremy Hunt to account for his incompetence as Health Secretary.
attributes.background: During his time as Health Secretary, Mr Hunt has slashed funding, alienated Medical Professionals, asked them to work to unachievable targets, allowed private patient information to be "misplaced" by a private contrator & used state money to cover this up. He refuses to be held accountable.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/170544
